index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting an Urban Development Action Grant (UDAG0 from the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development to assist in the development of the Olympic Block, authorizing implementation of a project by the Department of Community Development, making an appropriation from the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund therefor and establishing a repayment account in said fund; and authorizing any necessary implementing agreements.
